descriptionHtml:
[youtube]N7ys6KJjfgE[/youtube]

Tempest by elysees with Gomachaum

Tempest lesser power will be added automatically

Tempest
========
-Lesser Power
-Damage based = 'OneHanded or TwoHanded' high levels value 40% / 0.05 Script delay (during 4 seconds) 
 & finish damage 400%
-Require : Stamina 75%



Edit Console Command
===================
` > Set TempestDamageRate to 1.0 (1.0 = 100%)            //default value: 1.0 (1.0=100%)
` > Set TempestDelay to 0.05                                        //default value: 0.05 Second
    : Script delay time
    : Recommended 0.00(no delay)

` > Set TempestRequireStamina to 0.75   // 1.0 = 100%
` > Set TempestShakeCamera to 1           // 1:On 0:Off
` > Set TempestShakeXBOX to 0               // 1:On 0:Off
    : Shake Controller



::CREDIT::
Tempest Animation : Gomachaum



PS.Tempest animation file using 'whirlwindsprint_short.hkx'

Data\meshes\actors\character\animations
whirlwindsprint_short.hkx



*Feel free to use everything in this file.
author: elysees with Gomachaum
